== Xubuntu 14.04 Beta 2 ==

Welcome to the last Beta of Trusty Tahr. If this is the first time you've looked at a Beta this cycle then much has changed. Please see the blog page at <nowiki>[[http://xubuntu.org/news/xubuntu-14-04-beta-1/ | Beta 1]]</nowiki> for more details on those.

=== Known issues ===
As with any software and software collection, Xubuntu has some bugs and issues. These include:
 
* Thunar doesn't automatically mount removable devices and media (Bug:1210898)
* Network shares aren't shown on the desktop (Bug:1284914)
* Ubuntu Software Centre sometimes crashes when trying to install new software (Bug:1196625)
* When using some keyboard layouts, the layout changes to US after login (Bug:1284635)
* Debian wallpaper shown during Try or Install screen (Bug:1284910)
* XFCE wallpaper shown in live session and in installed system (Bug:1297170)
* Abiword's top ruler is not visible on first launch (Bug:1261203)
